Quirks

`yarn global add gulp-cli` does not install binaries properly.
Use `npm install -g gulp-cli`

Installing Semantic UI is also weird. Loops with yarn. Probably
fine with npm but I've been using yarn for this project. So...

from https://github.com/yarnpkg/yarn/issues/976
```
> yarn add semantic-ui --ignore-scripts
> cd ./node_modules/semantic-ui/
> gulp install
```
